name: The Mansion - Special Halloween Edition
description:
You have arrived at a mansion which your brother Walt, has bought recently but has gone missing ever since he has moved in there. No communications or phone calls, just silence. Now you are here to find out what has happened and get him back home.

Use WASD to move around Mouse to look around Left-click or Space to interact

One of the popular entries for Epic Megajam 2021, we have improved and added more gameplay to this edition. Enjoy!

Happy Halloween.

Rate and Comment!

Update1: Now you can have treats along with the tricks!
